oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Anne Robertson Johnson Cockrill historic marker, Nashville, Tennessee, 1978 June
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An historic marker at the grave site of Anne Robertson Johnson Cockrill that reads: “Sister of James Robertson. Conducted a small school on the ‘Adventure,’ the tiny boat which brought the early settlers from Fort Patrick Henry in the winter of 1779 and 1780.” Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cockrill family; Robertson family
